Related repos

  • Analyzes videos using vision models and Whisper
  • EdgeTAM: on-device SAM 2 variant for segmentation and tracking in videos, runs faster, processes 16 FPS on iPhone 15 Pro Max
  • Slices video files into segments
  • Converts video formats in batches on macOS
  • Video processing framework for real-time media applications
  • fast vision-language model for on-device AI
  • Framework for video understanding and generation
  • AI video clipper with speech and text recognition
  • Chat with videos through long-context processing
